TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Provides access to tracking data maintained in a SQL database by the for a workflow instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects are returned by a call to both <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and provide access to the tracking data maintained in a SQL database by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> for a specific workflow instance. The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> class optimizes its access to the database for its properties, which maintain collections. For more information, see <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.
## Examples The following code example shows how to obtain information about all <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> contains a string representation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> properties. It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Initialized%2A> property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`.
This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file. For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)).
[!code-csharp[WF_Samples#137](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#137)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#137](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#137)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ActivityEvents As IList(Of ActivityTrackingRecord)

Docs.summary: Gets the list of activity tracking records that have been sent for this workflow instance to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.
Docs.value: The list of objects sent for this workflow instance to the tracking database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents%2A> contains all activity tracking records sent for this workflow instance up to the current time; if <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents%2A> contains the activity tracking records sent up until the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents%2A> contains activity tracking records sent to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance. Activity tracking records are sent by the workflow run-time engine tracking infrastructure only when the workflow instance emits an activity status event that corresponds to an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoRefresh { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoRefresh : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether property data for this should be automatically updated when it is accessed.
Docs.value: if property data should be automatically refreshed when it is accessed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks To optimize database performance, properties that maintain collections of queried data, such as <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents%2A>, query the database for new elements only when the property is accessed, and the collection for such a property is only updated on an as-required basis when the property is accessed. The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> class maintains two timestamps for each property: one that indicates the time that tracking data for the collection was last loaded, and another that indicates the last time the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> was refreshed. When you get one of the collection properties, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> loads any tracking data that was added to the database between the last time tracking data for the collection was loaded and the last time the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> was refreshed and adds this data to the collection maintained by the property. The timestamp that indicates the last time data was loaded for the property is then set to the value of the timestamp that indicates the last refresh. If these two timestamps are equal, additional tracking data is not loaded for the property when it is accessed. Set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> to `true` to perform a refresh every time a collection property is accessed and ensure that the tracking data returned in the collection maintained by that property is always current. If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `false`, you must call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A> to reset the timestamp that corresponds to the last refresh.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime Initialized { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };
member this.Initialized : DateTime with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a that indicates the time at which the first for this workflow instance was requested by the workflow run-time engine.
Docs.value: A that indicates the time at which the first for this workflow instance was requested by the workflow run-time engine.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example shows how to obtain information about all <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> contains a string representation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> properties. It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Initialized%2A> property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`.
This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file. For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)).
[!code-csharp[Wf_samples#288](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#288)] [!code-vb[Wf_samples#288](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#288)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InvokedWorkflows As IList(Of SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance)

Docs.summary: Gets a list of objects that correspond to workflows that have been invoked by this workflow.
Docs.value: A list of objects that correspond to workflows that have been invoked by this workflow.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.InvokedWorkflows%2A> contains a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> for each of the workflow instances that has been invoked by this workflow instance up to the current time; if <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.InvokedWorkflows%2A> contains a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> for each of the workflow instances that has been invoked by this workflow instance up until the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.
The contents of this property are determined by the tracking data for this workflow instance contained in the SQL database managed by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>. This tracking data corresponds to tracking records that are sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for tracking events that are specified by the track points in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with this workflow instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Guid InvokingWorkflowInstanceId { Guid get(); void set(Guid value); };
member this.InvokingWorkflowInstanceId : Guid with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the of the workflow instance that invoked this workflow instance.
Docs.value: The of the workflow instance that invoked this workflow instance or an empty if this workflow instance was not invoked by another workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The contents of this property are determined by the tracking data for this workflow instance contained in the SQL database managed by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>. This tracking data corresponds to tracking records that are sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for tracking events that are specified by the track points in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with this workflow instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Refresh() cil managed

Docs.summary: Updates the property data for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A> does not actually load any data for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>. To optimize database performance, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> class loads data for its collection properties on an as-required basis. The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> class maintains two timestamps for each property: one that indicates the time that tracking data for the collection was last loaded, and another that indicates the last time the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> was refreshed. When you get one of the collection properties, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> loads any tracking data that was added to the database between the last time tracking data for the collection was loaded and the last time the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> was refreshed and adds this data to the collection maintained by the property. The timestamp that indicates the last time data was loaded for the property is then set to the value of the timestamp that indicates the last refresh. If these two timestamps are equal, additional tracking data is not loaded for the property when it is accessed. <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A> sets the timestamp that corresponds to the last refresh to <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Workflow::Runtime::WorkflowStatus Status { System::Workflow::Runtime::WorkflowStatus get(); void set(System::Workflow::Runtime::WorkflowStatus value); };
member this.Status : System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets the status of the workflow instance.
Docs.value: A that represents the current status of the workflow instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> is determined based on the tracking data for the workflow instance, specifically on the workflow tracking records sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure; therefore <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> depends, in part, on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> objects in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow instance. <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> in each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> maps to one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> values. If no workflow tracking records have been sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> is <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus.Created>.
## Examples The following code example shows how to obtain information about all <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> contains a string representation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> properties. It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Initialized%2A> property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`.
This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file. For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)).
[!code-csharp[Wf_samples#288](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#288)] [!code-vb[Wf_samples#288](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#288)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserEvents As IList(Of UserTrackingRecord)

Docs.summary: Gets the list of user tracking records that have been sent for this workflow instance to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.
Docs.value: The list of objects sent for this workflow instance to the tracking database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.UserEvents%2A> contains all user tracking records sent for this workflow instance up to the current time; if <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.UserEvents%2A> contains the user tracking records sent up until the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.UserEvents%2A> contains user tracking records sent to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance. User tracking records are sent by the workflow run-time engine tracking infrastructure only when the workflow instance emits a user event that corresponds to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WorkflowEvents As IList(Of WorkflowTrackingRecord)

Docs.summary: Gets the list of workflow tracking records that have been sent for this workflow instance to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.
Docs.value: The list of objects sent for this workflow instance to the tracking database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents%2A> contains all workflow tracking records sent for this workflow instance up to the current time; if <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.AutoRefresh%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents%2A> contains the workflow tracking records sent up until the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Refresh%2A>.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowEvents%2A> contains workflow tracking records sent to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance. Workflow tracking records are sent by the workflow run-time engine tracking infrastructure only when the workflow instance emits a workflow status event that corresponds to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Guid WorkflowInstanceId { Guid get(); void set(Guid value); };
member this.WorkflowInstanceId : Guid with get, set

Docs.summary: The of the workflow instance for which this applies.
Docs.value: The of the workflow instance for which this applies.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example shows how to obtain information about all <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> contains a string representation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> properties. It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Initialized%2A> property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`.
This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file. For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long WorkflowInstanceInternalId { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.WorkflowInstanceInternalId : int64 with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a number that can be used to find related records in separate views for this workflow instance.
Docs.value: A number that can be used to find related records in separate views for this workflow instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This is an internal join operation. <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A> provides a more efficient way to access data for a workflow instance in a SQL database than by using a workflow instance <xref:System.Guid>. Use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A> to find related records for this workflow instance in separate views.
## Examples The following code example shows how to obtain information about all <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> contains a string representation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceInternalId%2A>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Status%2A> properties. It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.Initialized%2A> property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`.
This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file. For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)).
